router_id.description: ID of the router into which the VPN service is inserted.

status.description:
Indicates whether IPSec VPN service is currently operational.
Possible values are ACTIVE, DOWN, BUILD, ERROR, PENDING_CREATE,
PENDING_UPDATE, and PENDING_DELETE.

description.description: Human-readable description for the VPN service.

subnet_id.description: The subnet where the tenant wants the VPN service.

tenant_id.description:
Owner of the VPN service. Only administrative users can specify a
tenant ID other than their own.

id.description: The unique ID for the VPN service.

name.description:
Human-readable name for the VPN service. Does not have to be
unique.
